title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Multimodal Representation-Based Advanced Mathematics Concept Design Course: Social Data

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain conditional probability concepts through multiple transformations: textual, visual models, symbolic representations, and verbal descriptions
Learners can present analysis results of social phenomena using three or more representational methods with project data
Learners can logically argue the relational connections between conceptual elements across multiple representations in whole-class discussions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
